scripts.xmeter: cd node_modules/xmeter/  &&  npm install  &&  npm run build  &&  cd -
scripts.jade:all: npm run jade:index  &&  npm run jade:styleguide
scripts.lessc:all: npm run lessc:chewie  &&  npm run lessc:legacy  &&  npm run lessc:styleguide
scripts.minify:all: npm run minify:chewie  &&  npm run minify:legacy
scripts.unbuild:css: rm styles/chewie.css styles/chewie.min.css legacy.css legacy.min.css styleguide/styles/styleguide.css
scripts.unbuild: npm run unbuild:html  &&  npm run unbuild:css
scripts.build: npm run jade:all  &&  npm run lessc:all  &&  npm run minify:all
